Description: Tombstone; carved sandstone with 8 line Kufic inscription on the face; the lines prolonged into the left margin, with slightly raised plain border; flared outwards slightly at the top.
Bibliographic references: Wright 1887 / Kufic Tombstones in the British Museum (9)
Condition: Fair; mounted on Caen stone base with 19th century lettering on the face
Acquisition name: Purchased through: Sir Ernest A T Wallis Budge
